mdRecord.dcterms:title: Reminiscences of my army life with the First South Carolina Volunteers, later called 33d U.T.: a very interesting little volume and the only war book written by a woman / for sale at 27 Holyoke Street, Boston, or our agent will call on receipt of postal ; price $1.25
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Taylor, Susie King, 1848-1912
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Text within a border of double wavy thick/thin rules.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Removed from "Reminiscences of my life in camp," Boston, 1902. Tracy W. McGregor Library (Call number: A 1902 .T3)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Taylor, Susie King, 1848-1912--Reminiscences of my life in camp
